title: Repository Rule: Confirm Unknown/Risky Commands
body: PRIORITY 0 REPO RULE: UNKNOWN or RISKY commands require explicit confirmed=true flag. This ensures deliberate human oversight before executing potentially destructive actions. This is a BLOCKING execution gate that must be enforced. Example: Setting confirmed for a risky file deletion attempt. All RISKY/UNKNOWN operations must have user confirmation.
